PROJECT1.TITLE: E-Commerce Application
PROJECT1.DESCRIPTION: A complete e-commerce platform with cart management and secure payments.
PROJECT1.DETAILS: Full-stack application with user authentication, product catalog management, shopping cart system, Stripe payment integration, and admin panel to manage orders and inventory.

PROJECT2.TITLE: Analytics Dashboard
PROJECT2.DESCRIPTION: Interactive dashboard for real-time data visualization.
PROJECT2.DETAILS: Responsive dashboard built with React and TypeScript, integrating Firebase for backend. Data visualizations with Chart.js, real-time updates, and PDF report exports.

PROJECT3.TITLE: Fitness Mobile App
PROJECT3.DESCRIPTION: Mobile application to track workouts and nutrition.
PROJECT3.DETAILS: Cross-platform application developed with React Native and Expo. Workout tracking, calorie calculator, personalized exercise plans, and synchronization with fitness devices.

PROJECT4.TITLE: RESTful API
PROJECT4.DESCRIPTION: Robust API for data management and authentication.
PROJECT4.DETAILS: API built with Laravel, using MySQL for persistence and Redis for caching. JWT authentication, Swagger documentation, rate limiting, and automated tests.

PROJECT5.TITLE: Corporate Website
PROJECT5.DESCRIPTION: Modern and responsive website for a company.
PROJECT5.DETAILS: Showcase website developed with Vue.js and Vuetify. Responsive design, smooth animations, contact form, project gallery, and SEO optimization.

PROJECT6.TITLE: SaaS Platform
PROJECT6.DESCRIPTION: Multi-tenant SaaS solution with subscription management.
PROJECT6.DETAILS: Complete platform with Next.js for frontend, PostgreSQL for database, and Docker for deployment. Multi-tenant management, subscription system, automated billing, and integrated analytics.
